title: Brand New East Lakeview 1BD Apt. W/D in Unit! Near Lincoln Park.
posting_body:
Pet: Pet Friendly
  • Rent Includes:: Gas
  • Parking:: attached garage
In addition to some of the city’s best schools, this north side neighborhood is home to some of the city’s most (Warning!
SAT words approaching) verdant parks, boisterous nightlife, and eclectic shopping.
Housing options run the gamut and make this a neighborhood of choice for everyone from young singles to new families.
Fabulous Lake View 1BD near the lake
Stainless steel appliances and granite countertops
Wonderful Elevator Building in Chicago’s Great Lakeview Neighborhood
Just a quick walk to the east end of the street and you will run into Lincoln Park, Lincoln Park Ultimate Frisbee, the Lakefront Trail and Lake Shore Dr!
View of John Hancock Building & Lakeview

FEATURES

  • Dishwasher
  • Eat In Kitchen
  • Elevator
  • Granite Counter Tops
  • Hardwood Floors
  • Lake View and City Views
  • Laundry
  • Laundry In Unit
  • Renovated
  • Roof Deck
  • Stainless Steel Appliances
  • Window/Wall A/C
